title: Human
description: Memories and hallucinations… what do these portraits mean to you?
product: Memories and hallucinations… what do these portraits mean to you?
detail_first: My camera has always been the friend that comes along for the ride, taking pictures with no real intention other than to take the pictures that should be taken. Barthes believed this to be fighting death, Sartre highlighted the significance of our minds ability to imagine worlds from static images; memories and hallucinations… what do these portraits mean to you?
